001package net.tvburger.jdl.lenet;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.ConvolutionalLayer;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.ConvolutionalShape;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.MnistDataSets;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
009
010import java.io.IOException;
011
012public class LeNet {
013
014    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
015        DataSet<Float> samples = MnistDataSets.loadDigits();
016        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
017            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = samples.samples().get(i);
018            ImageViewer imageViewer = ImageViewer.fromMnistImage(sample);
019            imageViewer.display();
020            ConvolutionalLayer layer = ConvolutionalLayer.create(28, 28, 1, 5, 1, 0, Activations.tanh());
021            ConvolutionalShape input = layer.getInputShape().withPixels(sample.features());
022            ConvolutionalShape output = layer.transform(input);
023        }
024    }
025
026}
